commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas372f0b2"

diff:
"372f0b2 Bug 397282 - Remove orphaned uninstall.properties files, r=sspitzer, a=mconnor
diff --git a/browser/base/branding/uninstall.properties b/browser/base/branding/uninstall.properties
deleted file mode 100644
index aec66e9..0000000
--- a/browser/base/branding/uninstall.properties
+++ /dev/null
@@ -1,7 +0,0 @@
-# These values are used to construct the registry keys for the Add/Remove
-# Programs dialog under Windows.  They must be kept in sync with the values
-# used by the installer.
-# XXX fileUninstall is no longer brand-specific, and can therefore be removed.
-fileUninstall=uninstall.exe
-URLInfoAbout=http://www.mozilla.org/
-URLUpdateInfo=http://www.mozilla.org/projects/minefield/
diff --git a/browser/base/jar.mn b/browser/base/jar.mn
index 6aefe11..0f63446 100644
--- a/browser/base/jar.mn
+++ b/browser/base/jar.mn
@@ -65,9 +65,6 @@ browser.jar:
   content/branding/aboutFooter.png               (branding/aboutFooter.png)
   content/branding/icon48.png                    (branding/icon48.png)
   content/branding/icon64.png                    (branding/icon64.png)
-#ifdef XP_WIN
-  content/branding/uninstall.properties          (branding/uninstall.properties)
-#endif
 #endif
 
 #ifdef TOOLBAR_CUSTOMIZATION_SHEET
diff --git a/browser/branding/unofficial/content/jar.mn b/browser/branding/unofficial/content/jar.mn
index 658c16a..1d03577 100644
--- a/browser/branding/unofficial/content/jar.mn
+++ b/browser/branding/unofficial/content/jar.mn
@@ -5,6 +5,3 @@ browser.jar:
   content/branding/aboutFooter.png               (aboutFooter.png)
   content/branding/icon48.png                    (icon48.png)
   content/branding/icon64.png                    (icon64.png)
-#ifdef XP_WIN
-  content/branding/uninstall.properties          (uninstall.properties)
-#endif
diff --git a/browser/branding/unofficial/content/uninstall.properties b/browser/branding/unofficial/content/uninstall.properties
deleted file mode 100644
index 0184492..0000000
--- a/browser/branding/unofficial/content/uninstall.properties
+++ /dev/null
@@ -1,7 +0,0 @@
-# These values are used to construct the registry keys for the Add/Remove
-# Programs dialog under Windows.  They must be kept in sync with the values
-# used by the installer.
-# XXX fileUninstall is no longer brand-specific, and can therefore be removed.
-fileUninstall=uninstall.exe
-URLInfoAbout=http://www.mozilla.org/
-URLUpdateInfo=http://www.mozilla.org/projects/bonecho/
diff --git a/other-licenses/branding/firefox/content/jar.mn b/other-licenses/branding/firefox/content/jar.mn
index 658c16a..1d03577 100644
--- a/other-licenses/branding/firefox/content/jar.mn
+++ b/other-licenses/branding/firefox/content/jar.mn
@@ -5,6 +5,3 @@ browser.jar:
   content/branding/aboutFooter.png               (aboutFooter.png)
   content/branding/icon48.png                    (icon48.png)
   content/branding/icon64.png                    (icon64.png)
-#ifdef XP_WIN
-  content/branding/uninstall.properties          (uninstall.properties)
-#endif
diff --git a/other-licenses/branding/firefox/content/uninstall.properties b/other-licenses/branding/firefox/content/uninstall.properties
deleted file mode 100644
index 755963c..0000000
--- a/other-licenses/branding/firefox/content/uninstall.properties
+++ /dev/null
@@ -1,7 +0,0 @@
-# These values are used to construct the registry keys for the Add/Remove
-# Programs dialog under Windows.  They must be kept in sync with the values
-# used by the installer.
-# XXX fileUninstall is no longer brand-specific, and can therefore be removed.
-fileUninstall=uninstall.exe
-URLInfoAbout=http://www.mozilla.org/
